item.title: Analyzing Combat Frames with FFMPEG
item.author: Author
item.description: When analyzing combat in other studio’s games or in the combat of games I’m currently developing, I find it useful to be able to split out individual frames of recorded video of gameplay in order to step through the frames of the game one by one. Get ready Download FFmpeg. Previewing ffmpeg settings Preview video frames with ffplay @REM For each *.mp4 file in the current directory, play it with the current settings.
